Bolts.subCategoryDescription: Bolts designed to hold fast over the long term

T-Handle Bolt.name: T-Handle Bolt
T-Handle Bolt.longDescription: This multi-purpose bolt provides superior clamping action. Adjustable collar must be welded in place to suit the application. Available in a black oxide finish to resist rust.

productInfo.name: Heavy Hex Nut
productInfo.longDescription: This hex nut has the extended height and width necessary to do the heavy work. Provides greater thread engagement and a high-performance load-bearing surface.

Screws.subCategoryDescription: Top-quality screws to suit all your fastening needs

productInfo.name: Heavy Hex Nut
productInfo.longDescription: This hex nut has the extended height and width necessary to do the heavy work. Provides greater thread engagement and a high-performance load-bearing surface.

productInfo.name: Compact Fluorescent Bulb
productInfo.longDescription: Compared to an incandescent bulb, this CFL bulb uses 75% less energy. Frosted bulb is suitable for indoor use in lamps and sconces to simulate natural sunlight. Bulbs with a yellow finish will repel insects. Note that these bulbs contain mercury and require safe disposal.

productInfo.name: Medium-base Chandelier Bulb
productInfo.shortDescription: Screw-in bulb with elegant pointed tip
productInfo.longDescription: This clear incandescent bulb is suitable for most chandeliers that accept medium-base (E26) bulbs. Emits a warm, golden light to make entranceways and dining areas more inviting.

productInfo.name: Standard Incandescent Bulb
productInfo.shortDescription: Standard household bulb with varying wattage
productInfo.longDescription: This low-cost bulb is suitable for general indoor use. Bulbs produce a warm, yellow-white light. Available in a clear or frosted finish.

productInfo.name: Dual-tube Ultraviolet Bulb
productInfo.shortDescription: Black light blue fluorescent bulb with screw-in base
productInfo.longDescription: Manufactured with high-quality black blue glass, this bulb can be used in multiple applications, including counterfeit detection, medical examination, and theatrical special effects. Suitable for any E26 socket.

productInfo.name: Screw-in LED Bulb
productInfo.longDescription: Lasting up to 25 times longer than a halogen bulb, this energy-efficient alternative bulb provides a 40-degree beam-spread angle. Suitable for any E26 socket.

productInfo.name: Halogen Floodlight Bulb
productInfo.shortDescription: Multifaceted reflector (MR16) bulb that produces a wide beam of white light
productInfo.longDescription: This high-efficiency, low voltage bulb offers a whiter light than an incandescent bulb. Ideal for both residential and commercial lighting. With a 40-degree beam-spread angle, this bulb is capable of illuminating a wide area.

productInfo.name: Candelabra Incandescent Bulb
productInfo.shortDescription: Flame-shaped screw-in bulb with clear or frosted finish
productInfo.longDescription: Perfect for sconces and chandeliers, this bulb emits a soft light from a symmetrical B10-shaped bulb. Candelabra base is standard 1/2-inch diameter. Indoor use only.

productInfo.name: Linear Fluorescent Bulb
productInfo.shortDescription: Shatter-resistant T12 fluorescent bulb with 2-pin base
productInfo.longDescription: This versatile bulb can be used both indoors and outdoors. Features a special plastic coating that retains glass shards in case of breakage. Intended for use with instant-start ballasts.

productInfo.name: Neon Indicator Bulb
productInfo.shortDescription: Miniature glow lamp that emits an orange-red light
productInfo.longDescription: Typically used as indicator lamps in the displays of electronic instruments and appliances, this miniature bulb can resist shock and vibration. Rated life is up to 25,000 hours.
